item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Preprocessing queue
item.description: Count of values enqueued in the preprocessing queue.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Configuration cache, % used
item.description: Availability statistics of Zabbix configuration cache. Percentage of used buffer.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing CacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Required performance
item.description: Required performance of Zabbix proxy, in new values per second expected.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Uptime
item.description: Uptime of Zabbix proxy process in seconds.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: has been restarted (uptime < 10m)

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Version
item.description: Version of Zabbix proxy.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Remote Zabbix proxy version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: VMware cache, % used
item.description: Availability statistics of Zabbix vmware cache. Percentage of used buffer.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the vmware cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing VMwareCacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: History write cache, % used
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Percentage of used history buffer. History cache is used to store item values. A high number indicates performance problems on the database side.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the history cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing HistoryCacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: History index cache, % used
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Percentage of used history index buffer. History index cache is used to index values stored in history cache.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX}% used in the history index cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing HistoryIndexCacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Total number of values processed by Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy, except unsupported items.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed numeric (float) values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed float values.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed log values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed log values.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed not supported values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of times item processing resulted in item becoming unsupported or keeping that state.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed character values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed character/string values.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed text values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed text values.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values per second
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Zabbix stats queue over 10m
item.description: Number of monitored items in the queue which are delayed at least by 10 minutes.

trigger.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes
trigger.description: zabbix[stats,{$ZABBIX.PROXY.ADDRESS},{$ZABBIX.PROXY.PORT},queue,10m] item is collecting data about how many items are missing data for more than 10 minutes.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Zabbix stats queue
item.description: Number of monitored items in the queue which are delayed at least by 6 seconds.

item.name: Remote Zabbix proxy: Zabbix stats
item.description: Zabbix server statistics master item.

macro.description: IP/DNS/network mask list of proxies to be remotely queried (default is 127.0.0.1
Port of proxy to be remotely queried (default is 10051).
Maximum average percentage of time processes busy in the last minute (default is 75).
Minimum average percentage of time processes busy in the last minute (default is 65).
